user.bio: Loves designing, interested in coding. Gooner by heart!

node.name: ICM
node.description: A smarter way of storing scanned contracts and process them to machine readable PDFs. Implemented using Spring Boot, Spring MVC, JPA-hibernate, Thymeleaf, Spring Security and MySQL.
